column5: * Navin Shenoy was promoted from senior vice president to executive vice president.

column4: BRIEF-Parkervision says middle district of Florida granted co's request to reopen patent infringement case against Apple  LG and Qualcomm
column5: * Parkervision -middle district of Florida granted co's request to lift stay and reopen its patent infringement case against Apple  LG and Qualcomm
